form.title: Online Inquiry
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your needs or questions in detail

success.title: Submitted Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for your inquiry. We will respond within 24 hours

form.error: Submission failed, please try again later

response.question: What is your response time?
response.answer: We promise to respond within 24 hours of receiving your inquiry. For urgent matters, we will respond within 2 hours.

products.question: How do I choose the right product for my pet?
products.answer: Our AI recommendation system will suggest the most suitable nutrition plan based on your pet's breed, age, weight, activity level, and other factors. You can also consult our professional nutritionists.

partnership.question: How can I establish a partnership with ASUPET?
partnership.answer: We welcome all forms of cooperation. Please contact us through our business partnership channel, and our business team will discuss cooperation plans with you in detail.

support.question: What technical support services do you provide?
support.answer: We provide comprehensive technical support, including product usage guidance, nutrition consultation, health monitoring, and more. Our professional team is always ready to help you.

footer.address: Zhangjiang Hi-Tech Park, Pudong New Area, Shanghai

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: ASUPET (hereinafter referred to as "we") respects and protects users' privacy rights. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information. By using our services, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.description: We may collect the following types of information:
collection.personal: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number, etc.)
collection.pet: Pet information (breed, age, weight, health condition, etc.)
collection.usage: Usage data (access time, page views, feature usage, etc.)
collection.device: Device information (IP address, browser type, operating system, etc.)

usage.title: Information Usage
usage.description: We use the collected information to:
usage.recommendation: Provide personalized nutrition recommendations for your pets
usage.communication: Communicate with you about service-related matters
usage.improvement: Analyze and improve our products and services

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties, except:
sharing.partners: Sharing with trusted service providers to deliver better services
sharing.legal: Legal requirements or to protect our rights and safety

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including encrypted transmission, secure storage, and access controls. We regularly review and update security measures to ensure data safety.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights.access: Access and view your personal information
rights.deletion: Request deletion of your personal information

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze website usage, and provide personalized content. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or need to exercise your rights, please contact us through:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read the following terms carefully before using our services

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to ASUPET's services. These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as "Terms") govern your use of our services. By using our services, you agree to comply with these Terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our services.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.description: As a user of our services, you agree to:
responsibilities.lawful: Use the services in a lawful and appropriate manner
responsibilities.security: Protect the security of your account
responsibilities.respect: Respect the rights of other users and ourselves

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited.description: You may not use our services for:
prohibited.harmful: Distributing harmful, threatening, or offensive content
prohibited.interference: Interfering with or disrupting the normal operation of services

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: Our services and all content, features, and characteristics are the exclusive property of ASUPET and its licensors, protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.description: Our services are provided "as is" and we do not guarantee:
disclaimers.accuracy: The accuracy or completeness of information
disclaimers.medical: Our recommendations cannot replace professional veterinary advice

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, ASUPET shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use our services.

termination.title: Service Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the services at any time, particularly in cases where you violate these Terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated through our website or other appropriate means. Continued use of the services constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China, and any disputes will be resolved in courts with jurisdiction in Shanghai.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:
